comments:
When the list of variables gets longer, a new variable will be displayed 
offscreen.  This is especially true with the details pane visible.
A feature to scroll to show the new variable would make debugging easier.

I agree. If there is no explicit selection, the variables view should scroll to 
show the new variable. If there is a selection, we should remain the same.
